document_data.mainbody:
rukkoh was a bugbear who lived on the Sword Coast during the late 15 century DR.
In the , Grukkoh made his way to the village of Moonhaven, after it was taken over by the cult of the Absolute. During his stay, he took some time to enjoy the company of the ogress Buthir. They went to the villages barn and had a rousing, and noisy, roll in the hay.
